segments.text: Welcome to our hotel's indoor swimming pool . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You see this is the first time for me to use the swimming pool . I've got no idea about the water temperature of the pool . I'm afraid it might be a little cold .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't need to worry about that . madam . We have a warm massage pool , and the temperature is 36 Â° C .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . But I'm not a good swimmer . Can you tell me how deep the pool is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , madam . The deepest place is two meters but you can swim in the shallow area , which is only l . 4 meter in depth . We have separate locker rooms over there and they are free of charge .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great ! Can you give me the key to the locker ? I can't wait to have a try .
segments.speaker: S2
